00008 class ORDataGen1DDecoder : public ORVBasicADCDecoder
00009 {
00010   public:
00011     ORDataGen1DDecoder() {}
00012     virtual ~ORDataGen1DDecoder() {}
00013 
00014     virtual inline std::string GetLabel() { return "Data Gen"; }
00015     virtual inline std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORDataGenModel:TestData1D"; }
00016     virtual inline std::string GetDictionaryObjectPath() { return "ORDataGenModel"; }
00017         virtual inline UInt_t CardOf(UInt_t* record)
00018                 { return IsShort(record) ? (record[0] & 0x0000f000) >> 12 : (record[1] & 0x0000f000) >> 12; }
00019         virtual inline UInt_t ChannelOf(UInt_t* record)
00020                 { return IsShort(record) ? (record[0] & 0x0000f000) >> 12 : (record[1] & 0x0000f000) >> 12; }
00021     virtual inline UInt_t ADCValueOf(UInt_t* record)
00022                 { return IsShort(record) ? (record[0] & 0x00000fff) : (record[1] & 0x00000fff); }
